oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Drama, Entertainment, and Music
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nelson, Alan H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Theater--England--London--History
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Contextual essay addressing performance, music, and theatre related to the Inns of Court. Essay originally published in print edition of the REED Inns of Court collection.
